costCalculator.title: Study & Living Cost Calculator
costCalculator.description: An interactive tool to estimate study costs in Germany, Jordan, and Romania for Palestinian students from Israel (Arab 48). Enter your preferences for a transparent, detailed estimate.
costCalculator.resultsDescription: The following table shows the estimated annual costs in euros (â‚¬).
costCalculator.disclaimer: Please note: These are estimates based on recent data and actual costs may vary. For an accurate, customized quote, please contact us.
costCalculator.germanyTooltip: Public universities in most German states are tuition-free for international students, except for semester fees.
costCalculator.lifestyleTooltip: Your lifestyle affects your monthly expenses for food, entertainment, and personal purchases.
costCalculator.accommodationTooltip: Housing costs depend greatly on the city and type of accommodation you choose.

currencyComparator.title: Currency Converter & Transfer Service Comparison
currencyComparator.description: Enter the amount in ILS and choose the target country for a comprehensive comparison between transfer services and banks to find the best and cheapest option.
currencyComparator.disclaimer: All estimates are approximate based on current exchange rates and information available from service providers. Final fees may vary depending on the receiving bank or payment method. Darb Study International is not responsible for payments or delays, but we provide tools for better comparison.
currencyComparator.bestRecommendationText: To transfer {{amount}} ILS to {{country}}, the best option is <1>{{service}}</1> to <2>{{bank}}</2>: you'll receive approximately <3>{{received}} {{currency}}</3> within {{time}} at a total cost of {{fee}} ILS.

gpaCalculator.title: GPA Calculator (German System)
gpaCalculator.description: Enter your grades and credit hours for each subject to calculate your GPA and its German system equivalent.
gpaCalculator.subject: Subject
gpaCalculator.errorMinSubjects: Please enter at least one subject with its credits and grade.

universityFinder.title: Tools & Calculators
universityFinder.subtitle: We've compiled useful tools and guides to make your study journey to Germany smoother. Download what you need and use our tools to prepare fully.
universityFinder.ctaSubtitle: Darb Study International will handle the rest: file preparation, translation, and guidance until admission.

germanyTab.description: Use the official DAAD search engine to find English-taught programs at German universities. We've filtered results to include tuition-free programs.
germanyTab.iframeErrorDetail: Some browsers may block embedded content. You can open it directly in a new tab.

romaniaTab.description: Browse the official Study in Romania portal to find universities and programs. For help finding the best match, contact us.

jordanTab.description: Below is a curated list of recommended universities in Jordan for international students. For more details about specific programs, please contact us.

resourcesPage.title: Student Resources & Tools
resourcesPage.subtitle: We've compiled useful tools and guides to make your study journey to Germany smoother. Download what you need and use our tools to prepare fully.

customGuide.title: Need a Custom Guide?
customGuide.subtitle: If you can't find what you're looking for or need specific information for your city or university, don't hesitate to contact us.

guides.title: Packing Checklist: What to Pack?
guides.description: A comprehensive checklist of all essential items you'll need for your trip and new beginning in Germany.

guides.title: Required Documents Guide
guides.description: Don't forget any important document! Use this guide to make sure all your papers are ready and organized.

guides.title: Tips for Your First Days Abroad
guides.description: A guide to help you adjust quickly during your first days and weeks in Germany.

guides.title: Heidelberg Medical Services Guide
guides.description: Your comprehensive guide to hospitals, doctors, and pharmacies in Heidelberg. Community contributed!

admissionGuide.title: University Admission Guide
admissionGuide.description: Everything you need to know about the admission process

visaGuide.description: Steps to obtain a student visa

housingGuide.title: Student Housing Guide
housingGuide.description: Best housing options for international students

costCalculator.question: How do I use the cost calculator?
costCalculator.answer: Simply choose the country you want to study in, university type, your desired major, and accommodation type. You'll get a comprehensive estimate of all expected costs.

exchangeRates.question: Are exchange rates up to date?
exchangeRates.answer: Yes, we update exchange rates daily from trusted sources. Rates are indicative and may differ slightly from actual bank rates.

accuracy.question: How accurate are the cost estimates?
accuracy.answer: Our estimates are based on recent data from universities and official institutions. We recommend contacting us for customized estimates for your situation.
